name: Postgres Database (RDS)
description: Managed PostgreSQL instance with private access limited to specific compute security groups.

inputs.name: vpc_id
inputs.description: The VPC ID where the database will be deployed.
inputs.label: VPC ID

inputs.name: subnet_ids
inputs.description: List of subnets (preferably private) for the DB Subnet Group.
inputs.label: Subnets

inputs.name: compute_security_group_id
inputs.description: The Security Group ID of the EC2/Compute layer. Traffic is allowed ONLY from this group.
inputs.label: Allowed Compute SG

inputs.name: db_name
inputs.description: The name of the database to create.
inputs.label: Database Name
